sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"喊，叫"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: cry, shout, exclaim, roar, scream, shriek, yell, call
means: cry ： 一般指因恐惧、痛苦、惊奇等而喊叫。
shout ： 指有意识地高声喊叫，常用于提出警告、发命令或唤起注意等。
exclaim ： 多指因高兴、愤怒、痛苦、惊讶等突发感情而高声喊叫。
roar ： 指发出大而深沉的声音、吼叫或咆哮。
scream ： 指因恐具、快乐或痛苦而发出的尖叫声。
shriek ： 指因惊恐、痛苦等或其它感情而发出比scream更为尖锐、刺耳的叫声。
yell ： 多指求援、鼓励时的呼叫。也可指因外界因素刺激而发出尖厉声音。
call ： 指大声说话或喊叫，以引起某人的注意。

sentence.Network_en: There was a scream of brakes from the carriageway outside.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面车行道上传来刺耳的刹车声。

sentence.Network_en: His mouth was a little open, as if he'd started to scream.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的嘴微微张开,似乎是要开始尖叫.

sentence.Network_en: Lou prattled on about various trivialities till I wanted to scream.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢就各种芝麻小事唠叨个没完，后来我烦得都想尖叫了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: origin uncertain; perhaps from Middle Dutch

encyclopedia.content: 歌曲《scream》选自张悬专辑《my life will》，由张悬作词作曲并演唱，2006年由Sony BMG出版并发行。

entry.def: When someone screams, they make a very loud, high-pitched cry, for example because they are in pain or are very frightened.

example.ex: Women were screaming; some of the houses nearest the bridge were on fire...
example.tran: 女人们在尖叫;离桥最近的几所房屋起火了。

example.ex: If I hear one more joke about my hair, I shall scream...
example.tran: 如果我再听到有人拿我的头发开玩笑，我就会尖叫。

entry.def: If you scream something, you shout it in a loud, high-pitched voice.

example.ex: I was screaming at them to get out of my house...
example.tran: 我尖叫着让他们离开我的家。

entry.def: When something makes a loud, high-pitched noise, you can say that it screams .

example.ex: She slammed the car into gear, the tyres screaming as her foot jammed against the accelerator...
example.tran: 她用力关上车门发动汽车，脚猛踩油门时轮胎发出刺耳的声音。

example.ex: As he talked, an airforce jet screamed over the town.
example.tran: 他谈话时，一架军用喷气式飞机在镇子上空呼啸而过。

entry.def: If you say that someone is a scream, you think they are very funny.

means.word_mean: 2. a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry;

sentences.sentence: "he ducked at the screechings of shells"
"he heard the scream of the brakes"

means.word_mean: 3. a joke that seems extremely funny

sentences.sentence: "she cried with pain when the doctor inserted the needle"
"I yelled to her from the window but she couldn't hear me"

means.word_mean: 2. utter or declare in a very loud voice;

sentences.sentence: "You don't have to yell--I can hear you just fine"
"Fighter planes are screaming through the skies"

means.word_mean: （因伤痛、害怕、激动等）尖叫 ~发出尖叫声

sentences.en: She screamed when she saw the robber.
sentences.cn: 她看到强盗时尖叫了起来。

sentences.en: He screamed to go with you.
sentences.cn: 他大声嚷着要跟你一起去。

sentences.en: A newsboy was screaming an extra.
sentences.cn: 一个报童正在尖声叫卖号外。

sentences.en: She screamed that there was a snake under the bed.
The child screamed himself red in the face.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子尖叫得脸都红了。

sentences.en: Her loud screams could be heard all over the house.
sentences.cn: 整个屋子都能听到她那高声的尖叫。

sentences.en: He's an absolute scream in our friends.
sentences.cn: 在我的朋友中他是个滑稽透顶的人。

sentences.en: She thought it was an absolute scream when I fell off my chair.
sentences.cn: 她认为我从椅子上摔下来是一件极其滑稽可笑的事情。

jushi.english: A scream for help came from inside the building.
jushi.chinese: 一声尖厉的求救声从楼房内传来。

jushi.english: Her loud screams could be heard all over the house.
jushi.chinese: 整个屋子都能听到她那高声的惊叫。
